name: Ginger Milk Tea
description: Indonesian milk tea with lemongrass and ginger syrup. Great for cold weathers.
ingredients: 50 gram fresh ginger, peeled and bruised
directions: Boil all ginger syrup ingredients on a stove top. Reduce heat and simmer for 5-10 minutes untill all sugar has dissolved.
Strain to get a clear syrup.
Steep the teabag in the hot water according to the manufacturer instruction.
Pour the milk and the ginger syrup. Stir to combine. Serve immediately.
